remMethod.val: ec ＋ lipse(看作leave， 离去) → 日月的光华离去 → (日、 月)食

trans.tranOther: an occasion when the sun or the moon cannot be seen, because the Earth is passing directly between the moon and the sun, or because the moon is passing directly between the Earth and the sun

trans.tranCn: 食， 遮掩光； 使暗淡， 使失色， 使相形见绌
trans.tranOther: to become more important, powerful, famous etc than someone or something else, so that they are no longer noticed
